key: giờ mở cửa, opening hours, mấy giờ mở cửa, thời gian mở cửa, lúc nào mở cửa, khi nào mở cửa
sql_template: SELECT SubProjectName, OpeningHours, ClosingHours FROM {prefix}.SubProjects WHERE SubProjectName = :place_name
description: Query opening and closing hours for a location

key: thông tin, giới thiệu, mô tả, chi tiết, info, information, description, about, lịch sử, history
sql_template: SELECT SubProjectName, Introduction FROM {prefix}.SubProjects WHERE SubProjectName = :place_name
description: Query general information about a location

key: vị trí, địa chỉ, ở đâu, location, address, where, đường đi, direction, chỉ đường, cách đi, how to get
sql_template: SELECT SubProjectName, Location, Introduction FROM {prefix}.SubProjects WHERE SubProjectName = :place_name
description: Query location and directions for a place
